about_the_game:
"If there is one thing you would really want to do before you graduate, what would it be?"

In Between All Times is a cinematic-visual novel about an graduate student's struggles finding purpose and identity, set in a surreal future in the stars.

STORY

You, a final year university student facing graduation soon, one day meet a mysterious campus ghost in your clubroom.

In this unexpected encounter the mysterious ghost named Byeol decides to join your club.

Together in this Literature Club, you and your new friend decides to complete a small goal you had always longed to fulfill.

To write a short novel before graduation.

SO, IN BETWEEN ALL TIME...

"A story about one's very personal yet confusing creative journey."

"THIS FOLLOWING DEMO CONSISTS THE PROLOGUE CHAPTER OF THE GAME.

THANK YOU!"

name: In Between All Times Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 64bit /11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Graphics: 1GB Video Memory
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
